nhc_headline: ...JOHN MOVING SLOWLY... ...CATASTROPHIC LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES  ONGOING OVER PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO...
summary:
...JOHN MOVING SLOWLY... ...CATASTROPHIC LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES  ONGOING OVER PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO...
 As of 3:00 PM CST Thu Sep 26
 the center of John was located near 17.6, -102.8
 with movement NW at 2 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 979 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.
